!!!! {"Values"}

* *{"Discrete"}* = 0 - {"Discrete mode i.e. snap the handle to discrete values (see ITrackBar.Min, ITrackBar.Max, ITrackBar.Divisions)"}
* *{"Continuous"}* = 1 - {"Continuous mode i.e. allow the handle to be dragged to any value (inc. decimals) between min and max values."}
